reporter-output.line: Feature File: src/it/resources/features/Story_C5935.feature
Feature: User launches Service now application and is able to log in successfully
Scenario: Verify user can access the Service Now application
Given I am on hbs secure login page (passed : 18s)
When I login with valid credentials (passed : 5s)
Then I land on Service now home page (passed : 0s)
Feature File: src/it/resources/features/Story_C5936.feature
Feature: User access Defect management area in service now application
Scenario: Verify user can access the Defect form
Given I am on service now home page (passed : 14s)
When I type the term Defect in filter text box (passed : 26s)
Then I see Defect module and other links inside the left pane window (passed : 4s)
When I click on Create New link in the left navigation menu (passed : 0s)
Then I see a new Defect form opens in the right pane enabling the user to enter a defect (passed : 4s)
Feature File: src/it/resources/features/Story_C5938.feature
Feature: Error validation for blank submission of Defect Form
Scenario: Verify all the required fields of Defect form
Given The defect creation form is open in the default state (passed : 43s)
When I click on the Submit Button (passed : 1s)

Then I observe that an error message pop-up window appears with the following text: The following mandatory fields are not filled in: Short description, Description, Environment, Application/Service (passed : 1s)
